attributes.action: Introduce legislation to allow taxpayers to set parking charges as an expense against their annual income tax bill.
attributes.additional_details: It is apparent that central government (ONCE AGAIN) has no power (has anybody else noticed just how much what our politicians have no power over, these days, has exponentially increased?) over car parking charges set by local councils so something else needs to be done by central government to protect and help the people they owe their existence in the corridors of power, to.  The rate of relief should be 100%.
